Basic BIG-IP Administration with Terraform¶

You will walk through a typical device onboarding workflow to deploy base network and app services configurations

Important

  • Estimated completion time: 20 minutes

Access Lab Environment¶

  1. Log in to the Unified Demo Framework Portal (https://udf.f5.com)

  2. Deploy the DevOps Base blueprint

  3. Under components, click the access dropdown on the client system, then click VS CODE

  4. Open a new terminal in VS Code

  5. Under components, click the access dropdown on the client system, then click Firefox

  • BIG-IP Infrastructure Onboarding
  • BIG-IP App Services Configuration
  • Modify and Destroy App Services Configuration
